Plot: After Marc dumps him, Kyle unites with Gwen and Tiffani to land sexually confused art model Troy by pretending to be straight. However, Marc wants Troy, too, and members from a notorious "ex-gay" group are slipping for the both of them.
Title: Eating Out 2: Sloppy Seconds
Writer: Phillip J. Bartell, Q. Allan Brocka
Actors: Jim Verraros, Emily Brooke Hands, Rebekah Kochan, Brett Chukerman
